    • Constructor Detail

      • Ignorant

        public Ignorant(java.lang.String type,
                processing.core.PImage image,
                Waka waka,
                int targetX,
                int targetY,
                processing.core.PImage fImage,
                processing.core.PImage sImage)
        Store Ignorant intial position, Ignorant x/y pixels, all image of Ignorant in different mode, Ignorant current image,Ignorant x/y coordinate frameRate, Ignorant previous mode, duration scatter mode, duration chaser mode, Ignorant speed, duration frighten mode, direction of Ignorant, Ignorant target x/y and indicate to draw line.
        Parameters:
        type - Ignorant.
        image - Image of Ignorant in normal mode.
        waka - Waka object.
        fImage - Image of Ignorant on frighten mode.
        targetX - Initial target of Ignorant (Corner of map (Xcoordinate))
        targetY - Initial target of Ignorant (Corner of map (Ycoordinate))
        sImage - Image of Ignorant on Soda mode.

    • Method Detail

      • checkTarget

        public void checkTarget()
        If Ignorant in chase mode, find the distance difference between them using distance formula. If the distance formula output more than 8 set waka coordinate as targetX and targetY, otherwise set targetX and targetY as in scatter mode. Check for their bound also, than set that results to ghost targetX and targetY position.

        If Ambusher in scatter mode, set ghost targetX to 35 and set ghost targetY to 0.

        Specified by:
        checkTarget in class Ghost
